Name: Pomegranate Margarita
Ingredients: 3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Earthy fruity tart pomegranate and delicately vanilla oaked tequila combine harmoniously in this Margarita .
Nutrition: One serving of Pomegranate Margarita contains 171 calories
